Welcome to Our Wellness Villa

Luxury Stay, Villa Experience Comfort & Elegance

Exceptional Minds
At work

Where Mind Meets Nature

A rare and refined wellness experience for those who seek more than a retreat, they seek themselves. Just a mile from the Sinharaja UNESCO Rainforest, Rain Drops is an intimate sanctuary where original mindfulness, advanced neuroscience, presidential-level culinary mastery, and a private research center come together exclusively for you.

Here, nature doesn’t just surround you, it welcomes you, aligns with you, and restores you. Your stay is curated to help you cultivate calm and truly enjoy it through: mind-designed cuisine, forest-guided meditations, real-time brain clarity tracking, and villa interiors crafted with natural luxury and quiet elegance.

At Rain Drops, where luxury becomes personal, science becomes human, and the rainforest becomes your private guide to clarity.

Wellness Activities

Swimming Pool

Outdoor Pool with Nature offers a refreshing swim experience surrounded by greenery and cool, clear water.

Story

The Story

Rain Drops was born from a simple but powerful idea: when nature and the human mind meet, clarity happens.

Business icon Dian Gomes first created this sanctuary beside the Sinharaja Rainforest, designing spaces that breathe with the trees, mist, and quiet rhythm of the forest. When Dr. GB Hewawasam experienced the property, he saw a deeper purpose: Rain Drops could become a living classroom for the mind. Today, Dian guides us as Founding Advisor while Dr. GB Hewawasam leads the resort with three practical pillars inspired by the Original Buddha's teaching (presented without religious form):

Study

Understanding yourself through quiet observation and the natural wisdom of the forest.

Investigate

Exploring moments, patterns, and experiences with curiosity to see life more clearly.

Practice

Applying awareness in daily actions, turning simple moments into mindful living.

Study, Investigate, practice

These principles shape everything we do, from mindful architecture to the way we help guests understand themselves through nature. Rain Drops is not just a place to stay. It is a place to slow down, learn, and transform. Come experience the rainforest in quiet luxury. Discover a new skill, new insight, or new clarity that travels home with you. Because at Rain Drops, we believe:

"Nature is not outside of you — it is within you."

Mind Meets Nature - Philosophy

At Rain Drops, wellness is not an escape — it's an awakening. Our philosophy combines the original mindfulness teachings of the Buddha with modern neuroscience to harmonize emotion and reason.

The Practice — Mindfulness of Breathing (Anapanasati),
— Loving-Friendliness (Mettā).
The Science — Calmness Creates Clarity
The Environment — Nature as a Teacher
The Experience — Personalized and Purposeful
The Purpose — For Leaders, Thinkers, and Seekers

Luxury meets consciousness — and together, they heal.

At Rain Drops Wellness Resort, we blend Buddhist mindfulness and modern neuroscience to help you rediscover calm clarity. Every guided walk, mindful breath, and healthy meal is designed to align your rhythm with nature's flow.

@Rain Drops — Experience the Experience.

Mindful Eating — Crafted by a Presidential Chef

Where Culinary Art Meets Inner Clarity


At Rain Drops, dining becomes a mindful ritual. Every dish is designed to calm the mind, awaken the senses, and nourish the body from within. At the center of this experience is Chef Sadha, Sri Lanka’s Presidential Chef, whose rare mastery elevates food into wellness. Guided by intention, compassion, and the rhythm of nature, he creates cuisine that harmonizes luxury with purity.

Our kitchen draws from:
  • Rainforest-fresh, locally sourced ingredients
  • Menus shaped by neuroscience and original mindfulness
  • Guidance from our U.S.-based nutrition advisor
  • Seasonal dishes that promote calm, clarity, and natural energy

From sunrise teas to serene evening meals, every plate at RainDrops gently brings you back to yourself.

“Food becomes healing when cooked with intention and eaten with awareness.” -Chef Sadha

Mindfulness Meets Neuroscience at Rain drops

Experience Calm, Measured by Nature and Mind

At Rain Drops Wellness Resort, ancient mindfulness meets modern science. Join our signature Mindfulness of Breathing and Loving-Friendliness Session, guided by Dr. GB Hewawasam and enhanced by Muse™ neurofeedback headbands — the same technology used by neuroscientists to track real-time calm and focus. Each guest receives a complimentary one-hour session, surrounded by the living serenity of the Sinharaja Rainforest. Feel your mind settle, your breath deepen, and your awareness expand — as nature, science, and mindfulness become one.

Rain Drops — Where the Mind Learns to Breathe.

Discover the Experience — Book Your Stay Today.

Where Beauty Meets Mindfulness

Sri Lanka's natural beauty was both awe-inspiring and soothing. A true highlight for Beverly and me was discovering Buddhist mindfulness and meditation. That quiet moment of learning brought clarity, peace, and gratitude—something we'll carry with us long after this beautiful journey ends.
Dr. Jim Ludema

An Unforgettable Journey

The serene landscapes and rich cultural experiences in Lanka exceeded all our expectations. We found ourselves immersed in traditions that date back thousands of years. Each day brought new discoveries and moments of connection that transformed not just our vacation, but our perspective on life.
Dr. Beverly Ludema
